Class StudentLogic

java.lang.Object
  StudentLogic
All Implemented Interfaces:
comp102x.assignment.GameLogic
public class StudentLogic
extends java.lang.Object
implements comp102x.assignment.GameLogic

This Student Logic class provide method for generating the correct intermediate Football Image, updating the goal position and updating the score list of the players.

swap1

public static void swap1(comp102x.assignment.Goal[][] goals,
                         int p,
                         int r)
This method is use for swaping the movable goal with an empty space at row=p and Coloumn=r. It is used when number of Goals hit is less than number of goal left.

swap2

public static void swap2(comp102x.assignment.Goal[][] goals,
                         int i,
                         int j)
This method is use to swapping the movable goal at position row=i and col=j with any empty or Goal which is already hit. It is used when number of Goals hit is greater than number of goal left.
